title: 12Pcs Mini Colouring Books for Children Age 2-8, Kids Activity Book for Party Bags, Fun Children Colouring Books with Themes Like Princess, Dinosaurs-Perfect Kids Gift Set for Birthday Party,Christmas
features: 【Great Value Set】This 12-piece set of colouring books for children includes 6 pages in each book,includes a variety of games such as coloring, stickers, connect the dots, drawing, numbers, etc. Features themes such as dinosaurs, unicorns and the underwater world, make these perfect kids activity books for creative play.

【Portable and Easy to Carry】Measuring 12 cm x 18 cm, these mini colouring books are perfect for kids party bag fillers and easy to carry in bags or pockets. Whether on a road trip or holiday, these books provide fun, screen-free entertainment.

【High Quality and Durable】These children's colouring books feature medium-thick paper that's perfect for coloring with crayons, pastels, and pencils. Pick a scene and let your child's creativity run wild! The perfect party favours for kids that's creative and fun all in one!

【Ideal Party Favour】Our mini colouring books for kids are great for party favours, school rewards, and holiday gifts. Which are perfect gift fillers for kids' party bags, encouraging imagination and creativity for children aged 2-8.

【Endless Creative Fun】Great for road trips, family holidays, or quiet time at home. These kids activity books will keep children entertained while helping develop the creativity, concentration, and fine motor skills.
description: Product description Creative and interesting children's coloring books, become your children's best friend! 1. These fun kids colouring books have 12 different themes: unicorns, dinosaurs, mermaids, animals, princesses, trucks, oceans, seasons, food, pets, numbers, sports. 2. Each children's colouring books come with a whole sheet of stickers, which can be used to stick the coloring book and change clothes. Which are perfect kids activity books! 3. The mini coloring book has thick paper, which can not only be used for coloring but also for decryption and matching, etc., to improve children's creativity and imagination. Features: Material: Paper Quantity: 12 books Single book size: 12*18*0.2cm Package weight: 0.34kg Package contents: 12 children's coloring books Warm tips: 1. Due to different monitors, there may be color differences between the actual product and the product picture. 2. The size of the product is manually measured, and there will be a certain degree of deviation. 3. If you have any questions, please contact us in time. Safety Warning To be used under the direct supervision of an adult
